description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play "free form" drums with up to 2 Xbox controllers. Newer model drum controllers are velocity sensitive! Customize button/drum assignments, for example, assign a 2nd pedal to control the hi-hat or add a 2nd kick drum. Select from over 60 drum sounds and modify sounds to create new drums. All while watching cool "X-Ploding" visuals.
description.short: Play "free form" drums with up to 2 Xbox controllers. Newer model drum controllers are velocity sensitive! Customize button/drum assignments, for example, assign a 2nd pedal to control the hi-hat or add a 2nd kick drum. Select from over 60 drum sounds and modify sounds to create new drums. All while watching cool "X-Ploding" visuals.
